## docker.DockerContainerProps interface

Props for [docker.DockerContainer](./cloud.docker.dockercontainer.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DockerContainerProps extends DockerGlobalOptions, Pick<ContainerProps, "autoRemove" | "portBindings" | "command" | "stopSignal"> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dockerHost](./cloud.docker.dockercontainerprops.dockerhost.md) | <code>string</code> | Host and port of the remote docker host to use. |
|  [image](./cloud.docker.dockercontainerprops.image.md) | <code>ImageNameString &#124; Handle&lt;DockerImageInstance&gt;</code> | image name as a string, or a handle to a DockerImage component |
|  [labels](./cloud.docker.dockercontainerprops.labels.md) | <code>ContainerLabels</code> | Labels to apply to the container. |
